scripts.build: npm run build -w oazapfts && npm run build -w @oazapfts/runtime
scripts.test: npm run test:unit -- --run && npm run test:e2e
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm test && npm run test:e2e:clean && npm run type-check
scripts.test:e2e: npm run generate-demo && with-server 'cd demo && vitest --run'
scripts.test:e2e:clean: if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain -- demo)" ]; then echo "Error: Generated code has changes. Please run 'npm run generate-demo' and commit the changes." && exit 1; fi
scripts.generate-demo: npm run prepare && oazapfts ./demo/petstore.json ./demo/api.ts && oazapfts ./demo/petstore.json --mergeReadWriteOnly ./demo/mergedReadWriteApi.ts && oazapfts --optimistic ./demo/petstore.json ./demo/optimisticApi.ts && oazapfts --useEnumType ./demo/petstore.json ./demo/enumApi.ts && oazapfts --argumentStyle=object ./demo/petstore.json ./demo/objectStyleArgument.ts && prettier -w demo
scripts.prepare: if [ "$PREPARE" != "false" ]; then npm run build && ln -sf $(pwd)/packages/codegen/dist/cli.js $(pwd)/node_modules/.bin/oazapfts; fi
